legal_basis: persons in need of protection under Canadian law
internal_flight_alternative: demonstrate lack of internal flight alternative (IFA)
decision_reasoning: Applicants failed to identify specific persecutors or prove inability to relocate internally
cause_of_action: past persecution linked to husband's political activism
procedure_followed: Judicial review analyzed whether risks were personalized and if IFA was unreasonable
result_of_case: applicants remain non-qualifying for refugee status
